user_story.i_want: view the details of the draft co-op
user_story.so_that: understand the co-op we are drafting

whens_list: I go to the Rules page
thens_list: I should see the customisations we have made to the rules

whens_list: I go to the Members page
thens_list: I should see a list of founding members of the draft co-op

givens_list: we have appointed some initial Directors and Officers

thens_list: I should see a list of the directors of the draft co-op
I should see a list of officers of the draft co-op
